trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Data.Sql" /> namespace contains classes that support SQL Server-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Data.Sql" /> 命名空间包含支持 SQL Server 特定的功能的类。

trans-unit.source: For information about the functionality that the classes within this namespace support, see [Enumerating Instances of SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md) and [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此命名空间中的类支持的功能的信息，请参阅[枚举实例的 SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md)和[SQL Server 中的查询通知](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md)。

trans-unit.source: In beta releases of ADO.NET version 2.0, the <xref:System.Data.Sql> namespace also contained classes for use with SQL Server common language runtime (CLR) integration.
trans-unit.target: 在 beta 版本的 ADO.NET 2.0 版中，<xref:System.Data.Sql>命名空间还包含用于与 SQL Server 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 集成一起使用的类。

trans-unit.source: However, those classes have been moved into their own namespace, <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些类移入自己的命名空间， <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using SQL Server CLR integration, see [SQL Server Common Language Runtime Integration](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用 SQL Server CLR 集成的详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 公共语言运行时集成](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md)。
